content.text:
# Jan Szwarc

|birth_place= Ustroń, Poland
|death_date =
|death_place=
}}
Jan Szwarc (born 8 July 1946 in Ustroń) is a Polish politician. He was elected to Sejm on 25 September 2005, getting 7642 votes in 27 Bielsko-Biała district as a candidate from Democratic Left Alliance list.
He was also a member of Sejm 2001-2005.
See also
* Members of Polish Sejm 2005-2007
External links
* [https://web.archive.org/web/20060805161319/http://www.sejm.gov.pl/poslowie/posel5/375.htm Jan Szwarc - parliamentary page] - includes declarations of interest, voting record, and transcripts of speeches.
